citations.narrative:
There are no copies of any acquisitions or dispositions for the hedgehogs. There must be a copy of the records of
acquisition and disposition for all regulated animals for proper management and traceability. The licensee must keep
complete and accurate records of sale of the regulated animals, and give one copy to the the buyer with each shipment
and one copy for his own records. The records must include all of the required information listed in AWA 2.75(b)(1)
Records, dealers and exhibitors.
Correct by August 24, 2023

The water bottles for 32 hedgehogs had pale to dark green material adhered to the sides and top of the bottle. Growth of
algae and biofilm may contaminate water and present a disease hazard. Water receptacles shall be kept clean and
sanitary.
Correct by August 24, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(3) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
There are no copies of any acquisitions or dispositions for the hedgehogs. There must be a copy of the records of 
acquisition and disposition for all regulated animals for proper management and traceability. The licensee must keep 
complete and accurate records of sale of the regulated animals, and give one copy to the the buyer with each shipment 
and one copy for his own records. The records must include all of the required information listed in AWA 2.75(b)(1) 
Records, dealers and exhibitors. 
 
Correct by August 24, 2023 
3.130 
   
Watering. 
The water bottles for 32 hedgehogs had pale to dark green material adhered to the sides and top of the bottle. Growth of 
algae and biofilm may contaminate water and present a disease hazard. Water receptacles shall be kept clean and 
sanitary.  
 
Correct by August 24, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
